prompt: A lone traveler wandering through a vast post-apocalyptic industrial wasteland, cinematic wide shot. Rusted megastructures, collapsed factories, broken cranes and hanging chains stretch into the distance. The air is thick with smoke, ash, sparks, and drifting embers. In the foreground and midground: massive biomechanical squid creatures inspired by the QonQrete logo — industrial cephalopods with segmented metal tentacles, glowing reactor cores, exposed pistons, cables, hydraulic joints, and molten orange energy pulsing through cracks in their armor. One colossal squid-entity emerges from the ruins, towering over the environment like an ancient machine god. Its central eye glows intensely, scanning the traveler. Explosions erupt in the background — fireballs, shockwaves, collapsing steel beams, sparks flying. Flames reflect off oily metal surfaces and wet concrete. Color palette: burnt orange, toxic green, radioactive yellow, deep industrial blacks, smoky grays. High contrast lighting, volumetric god rays cutting through smoke and dust. Ultra-detailed, hyper-cinematic, concept art quality, AAA game intro scene, Unreal Engine realism, sharp focus, dramatic depth of field. Sense of motion even in stillness — drifting smoke, moving tentacles, falling debris, heat distortion. Epic scale, dark sci-fi apocalypse, brutal, mechanical, ominous, awe-inspiring.
negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, watermark, deformed, ugly, duplicate, out of frame, disfigured
evolution_suggestion: shift colors toward cooler blue/purple tones, and experiment with impossible geometry
suggested_prompt_delta: shift colors toward cooler blue/purple tones, and experiment with impossible geometry
